description: Learn how to make easy meat-free nachos in only 30 minutes. They're also budget friendly and perfect for weeknight dinners.
name: Easy Bean Nachos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 840 g no added salt black beans

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange chips on a large shallow baking tray. Spoon bean mixture over chips, then scatter over cheese and bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is golden and has melted. Top with lettuce, tomato and coriander. Serve with sour cream.
